attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"egham's four busy crossings will each shut for up to 44 minutes an hour in peak times under plans for a high speed rail link to heathrow airport"
On this road, we are going to be pretty much trapped by level crossings which are closed for 36-44 minutes out of every hour. These plans will impact significantly on our quality of life and potentially impact on our house prices.

rejection.details:
This pettion overlaps with several already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/EghamCrossings/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
